major_00_fool.title: The Fool

meaning.general: A fresh start invites openness and experimentation.
meaning.light: Optimism and curiosity are helping you move forward.
meaning.shadow: Naivety or avoidance could blur the risks.
meaning.advice: Take a small step that keeps the door open to learning.

major_00_fool.detailedDescription: A fresh start invites openness and experimentation. Take a small step that keeps the door open to learning.
major_00_fool.funFact: Key themes for this card: beginnings, curiosity, leap of faith.

major_01_magician.title: The Magician

meaning.general: You already have tools available to shape the outcome.
meaning.light: Aligned intention makes your efforts more effective.
meaning.shadow: Scattered energy may dilute your impact.
meaning.advice: Choose one priority and direct your attention there.

major_01_magician.detailedDescription: You already have tools available to shape the outcome. Choose one priority and direct your attention there.
major_01_magician.funFact: Key themes for this card: focus, resources, initiative.

major_02_high_priestess.title: The High Priestess

meaning.general: Quiet insight is available beneath the surface.
meaning.shadow: Keeping too much hidden can create distance.
meaning.advice: Give yourself space to listen before acting.

major_02_high_priestess.detailedDescription: Quiet insight is available beneath the surface. Give yourself space to listen before acting.
major_02_high_priestess.funFact: Key themes for this card: intuition, stillness, inner knowing.

major_03_empress.title: The Empress

meaning.general: Supportive conditions allow something to grow.
meaning.light: Care and patience are strengthening your foundation.
meaning.advice: Nourish what matters most and simplify the rest.

major_03_empress.detailedDescription: Supportive conditions allow something to grow. Nourish what matters most and simplify the rest.
major_03_empress.funFact: Key themes for this card: nurture, abundance, growth.

major_04_emperor.title: The Emperor

meaning.general: Clear structure helps you move with confidence.
meaning.advice: Define boundaries that support your priorities.

major_04_emperor.detailedDescription: Clear structure helps you move with confidence. Define boundaries that support your priorities.
major_04_emperor.funFact: Key themes for this card: structure, leadership, boundaries.

major_05_hierophant.title: The Hierophant

meaning.general: Guidance from trusted sources can be helpful.
meaning.light: Shared values offer a steady compass.
meaning.shadow: Following rules blindly can limit growth.
meaning.advice: Seek mentors, but adapt advice to your reality.

major_05_hierophant.detailedDescription: Guidance from trusted sources can be helpful. Seek mentors, but adapt advice to your reality.
major_05_hierophant.funFact: Key themes for this card: tradition, guidance, learning.

major_06_lovers.title: The Lovers

meaning.general: A meaningful choice asks for alignment with values.
meaning.shadow: Avoiding a decision can create tension.
meaning.advice: Name what matters most and choose accordingly.

major_06_lovers.detailedDescription: A meaningful choice asks for alignment with values. Name what matters most and choose accordingly.
major_06_lovers.funFact: Key themes for this card: choice, alignment, relationships.

major_07_chariot.title: The Chariot

meaning.general: Focused effort creates forward momentum.
meaning.advice: Move steadily and keep your intention clear.

major_07_chariot.detailedDescription: Focused effort creates forward momentum. Move steadily and keep your intention clear.
major_07_chariot.funFact: Key themes for this card: drive, direction, self-control.

major_08_strength.title: Strength

meaning.general: Inner steadiness is more powerful than force.
meaning.light: Patience and empathy help you hold the moment.
meaning.advice: Lead with kindness, and trust your endurance.

major_08_strength.detailedDescription: Inner steadiness is more powerful than force. Lead with kindness, and trust your endurance.
major_08_strength.funFact: Key themes for this card: resilience, compassion, gentle power.

major_09_hermit.title: The Hermit

meaning.general: Solitude offers perspective and clarity.
meaning.light: Intentional reflection reveals the next step.
meaning.shadow: Withdrawing too far can reduce support.
meaning.advice: Take quiet time, then return with a plan.

major_09_hermit.detailedDescription: Solitude offers perspective and clarity. Take quiet time, then return with a plan.
major_09_hermit.funFact: Key themes for this card: reflection, solitude, guidance.

major_10_wheel_of_fortune.title: Wheel of Fortune

meaning.general: Circumstances are shifting in meaningful ways.
meaning.light: Good timing can open a helpful window.
meaning.shadow: Feeling out of control may cloud decisions.
meaning.advice: Notice the cycle you are in and respond calmly.

major_10_wheel_of_fortune.detailedDescription: Circumstances are shifting in meaningful ways. Notice the cycle you are in and respond calmly.
major_10_wheel_of_fortune.funFact: Key themes for this card: change, cycles, timing.

major_11_justice.title: Justice

meaning.general: Balance and honesty clarify the situation.
meaning.light: Clear choices bring integrity and calm.
meaning.advice: Weigh facts and values before deciding.

major_11_justice.detailedDescription: Balance and honesty clarify the situation. Weigh facts and values before deciding.
major_11_justice.funFact: Key themes for this card: fairness, truth, accountability.

major_12_hanged_man.title: The Hanged Man

meaning.general: A pause can shift how you see the issue.
meaning.light: Letting go invites a new perspective.
meaning.shadow: Stagnation may feel like being stuck.
meaning.advice: Release urgency and allow insight to emerge.

major_12_hanged_man.detailedDescription: A pause can shift how you see the issue. Release urgency and allow insight to emerge.
major_12_hanged_man.funFact: Key themes for this card: pause, perspective, surrender.

major_13_death.title: Death

meaning.general: An ending clears space for a new chapter.
meaning.advice: Acknowledge what is complete and turn forward.

major_13_death.detailedDescription: An ending clears space for a new chapter. Acknowledge what is complete and turn forward.
major_13_death.funFact: Key themes for this card: transition, release, renewal.

major_14_temperance.title: Temperance

meaning.general: Steady blending creates harmony over time.
meaning.advice: Aim for small adjustments rather than extremes.

major_14_temperance.detailedDescription: Steady blending creates harmony over time. Aim for small adjustments rather than extremes.
major_14_temperance.funFact: Key themes for this card: balance, integration, patience.

major_15_devil.title: The Devil

meaning.general: A pattern or attachment wants your attention.
meaning.advice: Name the pattern and choose one way to loosen it.

major_15_devil.detailedDescription: A pattern or attachment wants your attention. Name the pattern and choose one way to loosen it.
major_15_devil.funFact: Key themes for this card: attachment, temptation, patterns.

major_16_tower.title: The Tower

meaning.general: A reset clears away what no longer holds.
meaning.light: Honest change makes room for growth.
meaning.advice: Stay grounded and rebuild with what remains true.

major_16_tower.detailedDescription: A reset clears away what no longer holds. Stay grounded and rebuild with what remains true.
major_16_tower.funFact: Key themes for this card: disruption, truth, reset.

major_17_star.title: The Star

meaning.general: A calm sense of hope is returning.
meaning.advice: Focus on what brings steadiness and ease.

major_17_star.detailedDescription: A calm sense of hope is returning. Focus on what brings steadiness and ease.
major_17_star.funFact: Key themes for this card: hope, healing, renewal.

major_18_moon.title: The Moon

meaning.general: The situation is unclear, but insight is possible.
meaning.shadow: Anxiety might amplify what is unknown.
meaning.advice: Take things slowly and verify assumptions.

major_18_moon.detailedDescription: The situation is unclear, but insight is possible. Take things slowly and verify assumptions.
major_18_moon.funFact: Key themes for this card: uncertainty, intuition, mystery.

major_19_sun.title: The Sun

meaning.general: Clarity brings warmth and forward movement.
meaning.light: Optimism helps you see the path ahead.
meaning.advice: Celebrate progress while staying attentive.

major_19_sun.detailedDescription: Clarity brings warmth and forward movement. Celebrate progress while staying attentive.
major_19_sun.funFact: Key themes for this card: clarity, joy, confidence.

major_20_judgement.title: Judgement

meaning.general: A clear review points to a renewed direction.
meaning.light: Learning from the past supports a wise choice.
meaning.advice: Assess honestly, then commit to a fresh start.

major_20_judgement.detailedDescription: A clear review points to a renewed direction. Assess honestly, then commit to a fresh start.
major_20_judgement.funFact: Key themes for this card: awakening, review, decision.

major_21_world.title: The World

meaning.general: Completion brings a sense of wholeness.
meaning.light: You are ready to integrate what you have learned.
meaning.advice: Honor the finish and define the next horizon.

major_21_world.detailedDescription: Completion brings a sense of wholeness. Honor the finish and define the next horizon.
major_21_world.funFact: Key themes for this card: completion, integration, wholeness.

wands_00_knight.title: Knight of Wands

meaning.general: Momentum surges and you feel ready to move.
meaning.advice: Channel the rush into a focused aim.

wands_00_knight.detailedDescription: Momentum surges and you feel ready to move. Channel the rush into a focused aim.
wands_00_knight.funFact: Key themes for this card: drive, adventure, impulse.

wands_01_king.title: King of Wands

meaning.general: Lead with clear vision and steady fire.
meaning.advice: Lead with warmth and integrity.

wands_01_king.detailedDescription: Lead with clear vision and steady fire. Lead with warmth and integrity.
wands_01_king.funFact: Key themes for this card: vision, leadership, confidence.

wands_02_queen.title: Queen of Wands

meaning.general: Confidence and creative warmth draw support.
meaning.advice: Share your light without dimming yourself.

wands_02_queen.detailedDescription: Confidence and creative warmth draw support. Share your light without dimming yourself.
wands_02_queen.funFact: Key themes for this card: radiance, creativity, magnetism.

wands_03_page.title: Page of Wands

meaning.general: A fresh idea or message sparks interest.
meaning.advice: Follow the spark and test it.

wands_03_page.detailedDescription: A fresh idea or message sparks interest. Follow the spark and test it.
wands_03_page.funFact: Key themes for this card: curiosity, messages, discovery.

wands_04_two.title: Two of Wands

meaning.general: You stand at a threshold with options.
meaning.advice: Choose a direction and take the first step.

wands_04_two.detailedDescription: You stand at a threshold with options. Choose a direction and take the first step.
wands_04_two.funFact: Key themes for this card: planning, choice, horizon.

wands_05_three.title: Three of Wands

meaning.general: Progress grows as you look outward.
meaning.advice: Keep moving; your reach is widening.

wands_05_three.detailedDescription: Progress grows as you look outward. Keep moving; your reach is widening.
wands_05_three.funFact: Key themes for this card: expansion, momentum, foresight.

wands_06_four.title: Four of Wands

meaning.general: A pause to celebrate and anchor.
meaning.advice: Honor what is steady and shared.

wands_06_four.detailedDescription: A pause to celebrate and anchor. Honor what is steady and shared.
wands_06_four.funFact: Key themes for this card: celebration, home, stability.

wands_07_five.title: Five of Wands

meaning.general: Different forces clash and spark.
meaning.advice: Focus the energy on a shared goal.

wands_07_five.detailedDescription: Different forces clash and spark. Focus the energy on a shared goal.
wands_07_five.funFact: Key themes for this card: friction, competition, energy.

wands_08_six.title: Six of Wands

meaning.general: Effort is noticed and rewarded.
meaning.advice: Celebrate, then keep it grounded.

wands_08_six.detailedDescription: Effort is noticed and rewarded. Celebrate, then keep it grounded.
wands_08_six.funFact: Key themes for this card: recognition, success, momentum.

wands_09_seven.title: Seven of Wands

meaning.general: Stand your ground for what matters.
meaning.advice: Hold firm without closing off.

wands_09_seven.detailedDescription: Stand your ground for what matters. Hold firm without closing off.
wands_09_seven.funFact: Key themes for this card: defense, courage, boundaries.

wands_10_eight.title: Eight of Wands

meaning.general: Things move quickly and align.
meaning.advice: Ride the momentum with focus.

wands_10_eight.detailedDescription: Things move quickly and align. Ride the momentum with focus.
wands_10_eight.funFact: Key themes for this card: speed, messages, movement.

wands_11_nine.title: Nine of Wands

meaning.general: You are close to the finish; stay steady.
meaning.advice: Rest, then hold the line.

wands_11_nine.detailedDescription: You are close to the finish; stay steady. Rest, then hold the line.
wands_11_nine.funFact: Key themes for this card: resilience, persistence, guarded.

wands_12_ten.title: Ten of Wands

meaning.general: Responsibilities feel heavy.
meaning.advice: Delegate and set limits.

wands_12_ten.detailedDescription: Responsibilities feel heavy. Delegate and set limits.
wands_12_ten.funFact: Key themes for this card: burden, responsibility, pressure.

wands_13_ace.title: Ace of Wands

meaning.general: A new spark of passion arrives.
meaning.advice: Take the first step and nurture it.

wands_13_ace.detailedDescription: A new spark of passion arrives. Take the first step and nurture it.
wands_13_ace.funFact: Key themes for this card: spark, inspiration, potential.

swords_00_knight.title: Knight of Swords

meaning.general: Momentum builds around a clear decision.
meaning.advice: Act quickly, but keep compassion.

swords_00_knight.detailedDescription: The Knight of Swords charges forward with sharp focus, inviting you to cut through hesitation and speak plainly.
swords_00_knight.funFact: This knight is often linked to debate, strategy, and the power of clear reasoning.

swords_01_king.title: King of Swords

meaning.general: Lead with clarity and balanced judgment.
meaning.advice: Be firm and fair; explain your reasoning.

swords_01_king.detailedDescription: The King of Swords represents wise authority—using intellect to guide outcomes with integrity.
swords_01_king.funFact: In tarot lore he is associated with air signs and ethical leadership.

swords_02_queen.title: Queen of Swords

meaning.general: Truth and boundaries bring relief.
meaning.advice: Speak with honesty and care.

swords_02_queen.detailedDescription: The Queen of Swords invites you to honor feelings while choosing the most truthful path.
swords_02_queen.funFact: She is sometimes called the “clear-eyed” queen for her insight.

swords_03_page.title: Page of Swords

meaning.general: New ideas arrive; stay alert.
meaning.advice: Stay open, but verify facts.

swords_03_page.detailedDescription: The Page of Swords signals a learning phase, where questions and information shape your next move.
swords_03_page.funFact: Pages are linked to students, beginners, and messenger energy.

swords_04_two.title: Two of Swords

meaning.general: A decision waits for calm clarity.
meaning.advice: Gather one more fact, then choose.

swords_04_two.detailedDescription: The Two of Swords highlights a quiet pause, where peace depends on a balanced decision.
swords_04_two.funFact: The crossed swords symbolize protection and a temporary truce.

swords_05_three.title: Three of Swords

meaning.general: A painful truth clears the air.
meaning.advice: Let the truth out and make space to mend.

swords_05_three.detailedDescription: The Three of Swords acknowledges sorrow so it can pass through, not stay stuck.
swords_05_three.funFact: The classic image of a heart pierced by swords is one of tarot’s most recognized.

swords_06_four.title: Four of Swords

meaning.general: Rest is the medicine now.
meaning.advice: Pause long enough to reset.

swords_06_four.detailedDescription: The Four of Swords signals a restorative pause—step back and let your mind settle.
swords_06_four.funFact: This card is tied to retreats, meditation, and convalescence.

swords_07_five.title: Five of Swords

meaning.general: Tension lingers after a clash.
meaning.advice: Choose peace over proving a point.

swords_07_five.detailedDescription: The Five of Swords warns that victory at any price can leave you isolated.
swords_07_five.funFact: It is often read as a lesson in humility and repair.

swords_08_six.title: Six of Swords

meaning.general: You are moving toward calmer waters.
meaning.advice: Travel light; leave what hurts behind.

swords_08_six.detailedDescription: The Six of Swords speaks of a quiet journey from turbulence to peace.
swords_08_six.funFact: This card is linked to travel, therapy, and gradual recovery.

swords_09_seven.title: Seven of Swords

meaning.general: Act wisely and choose your approach.
meaning.advice: Be strategic, but stay ethical.

swords_09_seven.detailedDescription: The Seven of Swords highlights the need for careful planning and selective sharing.
swords_09_seven.funFact: It is sometimes called the card of stealth or tactics.

swords_10_eight.title: Eight of Swords

meaning.general: Feeling trapped may be a mindset.
meaning.advice: Name the fear and loosen the ties.

swords_10_eight.detailedDescription: The Eight of Swords reminds you that new options appear when your perspective shifts.
swords_10_eight.funFact: This card often points to mental blocks rather than physical ones.

swords_11_nine.title: Nine of Swords

meaning.general: Worry is loud; seek support.
meaning.advice: Speak your fears to someone you trust.

swords_11_nine.detailedDescription: The Nine of Swords points to mental stress and urges gentle care for your mind.
swords_11_nine.funFact: Traditionally, this card is linked to nightmares and overthinking.

swords_12_ten.title: Ten of Swords

meaning.general: An ending clears the way forward.
meaning.advice: Let it finish so you can rebuild.

swords_12_ten.detailedDescription: The Ten of Swords marks a hard finale that makes space for a new chapter.
swords_12_ten.funFact: Despite its image, it signals that the worst is over.

swords_13_ace.title: Ace of Swords

meaning.general: A clear insight cuts through confusion.
meaning.advice: Use truth as a tool, not a weapon.

swords_13_ace.detailedDescription: The Ace of Swords brings a crisp beginning in thought—an idea that can change everything.
swords_13_ace.funFact: Aces are often seen as the pure essence of their suit.

pentacles_00_knight.title: Knight of Pentacles

meaning.general: Steady work builds lasting results.
meaning.advice: Stick to the plan; small steps matter.

pentacles_00_knight.detailedDescription: The Knight of Pentacles encourages methodical progress and honoring commitments.
pentacles_00_knight.funFact: This knight is known for being the most dependable in the deck.

pentacles_01_king.title: King of Pentacles

meaning.general: Practical leadership creates security.
meaning.advice: Lead with care for people and resources.

pentacles_01_king.detailedDescription: The King of Pentacles embodies mature success—building wealth that supports the community.
pentacles_01_king.funFact: He is often associated with financial savvy and grounded authority.

pentacles_02_queen.title: Queen of Pentacles

meaning.general: Care and practicality go hand in hand.
meaning.advice: Tend the roots and your world will flourish.

pentacles_02_queen.detailedDescription: The Queen of Pentacles blends warmth with practicality, reminding you to care for body and home.
pentacles_02_queen.funFact: She is sometimes linked to earth signs and domestic magic.

pentacles_03_page.title: Page of Pentacles

meaning.general: A new practical path opens.
meaning.advice: Start small and practice daily.

pentacles_03_page.detailedDescription: The Page of Pentacles signals a fresh start with money, study, or health routines.
pentacles_03_page.funFact: Pages are the students of the suit, eager to learn by doing.

pentacles_04_two.title: Two of Pentacles

meaning.general: Juggling priorities calls for flexibility.
meaning.advice: Simplify and keep what moves you.

pentacles_04_two.detailedDescription: The Two of Pentacles highlights the dance of managing time, money, and energy.
pentacles_04_two.funFact: The infinity loop in the imagery symbolizes ongoing motion.

pentacles_05_three.title: Three of Pentacles

meaning.general: Skill grows through collaboration.
meaning.advice: Invite input and refine your craft.

pentacles_05_three.detailedDescription: The Three of Pentacles celebrates building something solid with others.
pentacles_05_three.funFact: It often points to apprenticeships and learning from mentors.

pentacles_06_four.title: Four of Pentacles

meaning.general: Hold gently to what you value.
meaning.advice: Protect your resources without closing your heart.

pentacles_06_four.detailedDescription: The Four of Pentacles asks you to balance security with openness.
pentacles_06_four.funFact: It is often read as a lesson about healthy boundaries with money.

pentacles_07_five.title: Five of Pentacles

meaning.general: Help exists even in hard moments.
meaning.advice: Reach out; you do not have to do this alone.

pentacles_07_five.detailedDescription: The Five of Pentacles points to temporary struggle and the strength of shared support.
pentacles_07_five.funFact: This card is linked to community care and recovery.

pentacles_08_six.title: Six of Pentacles

meaning.general: Give and receive in balance.
meaning.advice: Offer help with clear boundaries.

pentacles_08_six.detailedDescription: The Six of Pentacles focuses on fair exchange and mindful giving.
pentacles_08_six.funFact: It often appears during loans, gifts, or mentorship.

pentacles_09_seven.title: Seven of Pentacles

meaning.general: Pause to review your progress.
meaning.advice: Let your efforts mature before changing course.

pentacles_09_seven.detailedDescription: The Seven of Pentacles is about tending what you planted and checking results.
pentacles_09_seven.funFact: It is often called the card of cultivation.

pentacles_10_eight.title: Eight of Pentacles

meaning.general: Focused practice improves results.
meaning.advice: Keep refining one step at a time.

pentacles_10_eight.detailedDescription: The Eight of Pentacles celebrates dedicated work and mastery in progress.
pentacles_10_eight.funFact: It is a classic card for apprenticeships and skill-building.

pentacles_11_nine.title: Nine of Pentacles

meaning.general: Your efforts bring comfort and ease.
meaning.advice: Enjoy what you've built and share wisely.

pentacles_11_nine.detailedDescription: The Nine of Pentacles marks a season of earned confidence and quiet luxury.
pentacles_11_nine.funFact: In readings it can point to solo success or refinement.

pentacles_12_ten.title: Ten of Pentacles

meaning.general: Long-term stability is in focus.
meaning.advice: Build a foundation that supports future growth.

pentacles_12_ten.detailedDescription: The Ten of Pentacles highlights legacy—what you build that lasts.
pentacles_12_ten.funFact: It is often associated with inheritance or family resources.

pentacles_13_ace.title: Ace of Pentacles

meaning.general: A tangible opportunity appears.
meaning.advice: Plant the seed and nurture it daily.

pentacles_13_ace.detailedDescription: The Ace of Pentacles is the spark of a practical new start—money, health, or home.
pentacles_13_ace.funFact: Aces in Pentacles often signal new income or projects.
